allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add competitor monitoring system with camping-and-co.com integration

Added comprehensive competitor discovery and monitoring features:

Backend:
- New web scrapers for camping-and-co.com and local campsite data
- Database schema for competitors and competitor_pricing tables with RLS
- API endpoints for competitor discovery and monitoring management
- Uses supabaseAdmin (service role) to bypass RLS for backend operations

Frontend:
- Enhanced CompetitorMonitor page with discovery UI
- Real-time monitoring state management with loading indicators
- Beautiful campsite cards with photos, ratings, amenities
- Start/stop monitoring functionality with visual feedback

Database:
- competitor-tables.sql with full schema and RLS policies
- Setup scripts for easy database initialization

Documentation:
- Reorganized docs into archive/, setup/, references/, developer/
- Added light theme design system documentation
- Comprehensive competitor discovery component docs

Cleanup:
- Removed unused middleware, utilities, and chart components
- Archived old documentation and task files
- Updated dependencies

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
